long_description: Impossible to confuse with sweater vests found at golf courses and bingo parlors, the Patagonia Down Sweater vest comes packed with ultra-toasty down that traps heat. Use it in alpine conditions. Recycled polyester shell is tear resistant and windproof; Deluge(R) water-repellent finish causes snow and rain to bead up and roll off. Premium European 800-fill-power goose down insulation is extremely warm, lightweight and compressible. Details include quilted-through construction, elastic binding at armholes and drawcord hem. Includes 2 zippered handwarmer pockets and a stretch mesh interior chest pocket that doubles as a stuff sack, with carabiner clip-in loop. Patagonia Down Sweater has a slim fit and may be worn over baselayers and light midlayers.
short_description: Impossible to confuse with sweater vests found at golf courses and bingo parlors, the Patagonia Down Sweater vest comes packed with ultra-toasty down that traps heat. Use it in alpine conditions.
